message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DL, cs.CY

The paper proposes a general embedding approach for hyper-documents, which are commonly found in web pages and academic papers. The paper focuses on two tasks, paper classification and citation recommendation, which are both related to information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.IR and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also uses deep learning techniques, such as neural networks, which are commonly used in machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) research, suggesting cs.LG and cs.DL as likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the importance of preserving necessary information in hyper-documents, which is related to cybersecurity (cs.CY) and data privacy research.
